definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: of uncertain meaning, perh. choice products (cf. DHM supr.), of various fruits, etc. [[מִזִּמְרַת הארץ]] Ge 43:11; LXX oi( karpoi/, so MV Str.; > music, or praise of the land, fig. for produce (√ I. [[זמר]]) Thes Tu Kn SS.—I. ´[[ז]] v. sub I. [[זמר]]

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: Uncertain in deriv. are the five foll.: —
